IDBFactoryDatabases.summary: The databases method of the interface returns a list representing all the available databases, including their names and versions.

blockquote.para: Note: This method is introduced in a draft of a specifications and browser compatibility is limited.

IDBFactoryDatabases.returns: A promise that resolves either to an error or a list of dictionaries, each with two elements, name and version:
